001import java.io.File;
002import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
003import java.util.Scanner;
004
005/**
006 * Decrivez votre classe GameEngine ici.
007 *
008 * @author (votre nom)
009 * @version (un numero de version ou une date)
010 */
011public class GameEngine
012{
013    /** le joueur */
014    private Player aPlayer;
015    /** le parser qui analyse les commandes */
016    private Parser aParser;
017    /** l'interface utilisateur */
018    private UserInterface aGui;
019
020    /**
021     * Constructeur d'objets de classe GameEngine
022     */
023    public GameEngine()
024    {
025        String vPrenom = javax.swing.JOptionPane.showInputDialog( "What's your name?" );
026        this.aPlayer = new Player( vPrenom );
027        this.createRooms();
028        this.aParser = new Parser();
029    }
030
031    /**
032     * Setter pour l'interface utilisateur.
033     * @param pUserInterface interface utilisateur
034     */
035    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
036    {
037        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
038        this.printWelcome();
039    }
040
041    /**
042     * Initialiser les salles, les sorties et la position actuelle du joueur.
043     */
044    private void createRooms() {
045        Room vOutside = new Room(
046                "standing outside the secret laboratory, \nthe entrance looming ahead with an air of mystery and danger.","entrance.jpg");
047        Room vStorage = new Room(
048                "in a cluttered storage room, \nfilled with various discarded objects and tools.","storage.jpg");
049        Room vClean = new Room(
050                "in the clean room, \na sterile area where disinfection and changing take place. \nThe air smells faintly of chemicals, \nand a row of lockers lines the wall.","clean.jpg");
051        Room vMeeting = new Room(
052                "in the meeting room, \nwhere scientists plan their experiments. \nA large table and chairs dominate the space, \nand diagrams cover the walls.","meeting.jpg");
053        Room vPrison = new Room(
054                "in the prison room, \nwhere human subjects are held in confinement. \nThe air feels heavy with tension.","prison.jpg");
055        Room vAnimal = new Room(
056                "in the animal room, a isolated space \nwhere animals, transformed by experiments, are kept in cages. \nThe room is eerily quiet.","animal.jpg");
057        Room vArchive = new Room(
058                " in the archive room, a space \nfilled with shelves of files and records. \nEach document holds secrets about the experiments conducted here.","archive.jpg");
059        Room vExperimentation = new Room(
060                "in the experimentation room, \nwhere the darkest of the laboratory's procedures are carried out. \nSurgical beds and strange equipment fill the space.","exprience.png");
061        Room vAleatoire = vAnimal; // random room, pas encore fait
062
063        vOutside.setExits("south", vStorage);
064        vOutside.addItem("an old pair of glasses without lenses. Wearing it can make you see things differently", 40,"glasses",true,true);  // 40 is the weight of the item
065
066        vStorage.setExits("down", vClean);
067        vStorage.setExits("north", vOutside);
068        vStorage.addItem("a key for the cabinet in the archives room", 60,"key",true,true);
069        vStorage.addItem("an invisible cloth can help you hide", 50,"cloth",true,false);
070        vStorage.addItem("a torn piece of paper with the name Alice", 2,"paper",false,true);
071        vStorage.addItem("a plan of the entire laboratory but broken", 10,"plan",false,true);
072
073        vClean.setExits("west", vMeeting);
074        vClean.setExits("south", vAleatoire);
075        vClean.setExits("up", vStorage);
076        vClean.addItem("an access card for the experiment room",50,"card",true,true);
077        vClean.addItem("a magic cake that can increase your maximum ability to take things by 20% after eating it", 60,"magicCake",true,false);
078        
079        vMeeting.setExits("east", vClean);
080        vMeeting.setExits("west", vArchive);
081        vMeeting.setExits("south", vPrison);
082        vMeeting.setExits("north", vAnimal);
083        vMeeting.addItem("a whiteboard displays a discussion about which animal to place 2566's soul into, along with a prominent slogan",500,"whiteboard",false,true);
084
085        vPrison.setExits("north", vMeeting);
086
087        vAnimal.setExits("west", vExperimentation);
088        vAnimal.setExits("south", vMeeting);
089        vAnimal.addItem("an empty cage with a small plastic tag labeled 2566", 300,"cage",false,true);
090
091        vArchive.setExits("east", vMeeting);
092        vArchive.setExits("north", vExperimentation);
093        vArchive.addItem("a cabinet with a lock", 900,"cabinet",false,true);
094        //attends key open cabinet
095        //"You use the key to open the cabinet and find a lot of \nexperimenter information, sorted by name. You easily find \nAlice's information and find that her name and photo are \nthe same as your missing sister. You also find that the latest information \nindicates that she will be sent to the laboratory within a week. \nWhen flipping through the information, you find that the \nearliest information about this laboratory appears in 2050. \nYou suspect that this is the year the laboratory was founded. \nA piece of paper with August 9, 2050 written on it falls \nfrom the book, proving your guess."
096
097        vExperimentation.setExits("east", vAnimal);
098        vExperimentation.setExits("south", vArchive);
099        vExperimentation.addItem("a bed with a small sign saying 2566", 300,"bed",false,true);
100
101        aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vOutside);
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Deplacer le joueur dans une direction donnee.
106     * @param pCmd commande a traiter
107     */
108    private void goRoom(final Command pCmd) {
109        if (!pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
110            this.aGui.println("Go where ?");
111            return;
112        }
113        String vDirection = pCmd.getSecondWord();
114        Room vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getExit(vDirection);
115        if(vNextRoom==null){
116            this.aGui.println("There is no door !");
117        } else{
118            this.aPlayer.addPreviousRoom(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());//Pushes a new element on top of this Stack.
119            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vNextRoom);
120        }
121        this.printLocationInfo();
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * Deplacer le joueur dans la salle precedante.
126     * @param pCmd commande a traiter
127     */
128    private void back(final Command pCmd) {
129        if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
130            this.aGui.println("You cannot specify a direction when going back.");
131            return;
132        }else if(this.aPlayer.PreviousRoomIsEmpty()){
133            this.aGui.println("There's nowhere you can go back to.");
134            return;
135        }
136        Room vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getPreviousRoom();//Returns the head element without modifying the Stack.
137        this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vNextRoom);
138        this.aPlayer.removePreviousRoom();//Removes the head element from this Stack.
139        this.printLocationInfo();
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Afficher les informations localisation de salle actuel.
144     */
145    private void printLocationInfo() {
146        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription(this.aPlayer));
147        if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImgName() != null )
148            this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImgName() );
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * Afficher les informations de bienvenue et les informations de la position actuelle.
153     */
154    private void printWelcome() {
155        this.aGui.println("\nWelcome to the Secret of the Cat!\n"
156                + "Secret of the Cat is a new, incredibly boring adventure game.\n"
157                + "Type 'help' if you need help.\n");
158        this.printLocationInfo();
159    }
160
161    /**
162     * Afficher les informations d'aide.
163     */
164    private void printHelp() {
165        this.aGui.println("You are lost. You are alone.\n"
166                + "You wander around at the laboratory.\n\n"
167                + "Your command words are:"+this.aParser.getCommands()+"\n");
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * traiter la commande quit.
172     * @param pCmd commande a traiter
173     */
174    private void quit(final Command pCmd) {
175        if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
176            this.aGui.println("Quit can't be followed by a second word.");
177        }else {
178            this.aGui.println("Thank you for playing.  Good bye.");
179            this.aGui.enable(false);
180        }
181    }
182
183    /**
184     * Traiter la commande du joueur.
185     * @param pCmd commande a traiter
186     */
187    public void interpretCommand(final String pCmd) {
188
189        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCmd );
190        Command vCmd = this.aParser.getCommand( pCmd );
191
192        if (vCmd.isUnknown()) {
193            this.aGui.println("Erreur du programmeur : commande non reconnue !");
194            return;
195        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("go")) {
196            this.goRoom(vCmd);
197        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("quit")) {
198            this.quit(vCmd);
199        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("help")) {
200            this.printHelp();
201        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("look")) {
202            this.look(vCmd);
203        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("eat")) {
204            this.eat(vCmd);
205        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("back")) {
206            this.back(vCmd);
207        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("test")) {
208            this.test(vCmd);
209        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("take")) {
210            this.take(vCmd);
211        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("drop")) {
212            this.drop(vCmd);
213        } else if (vCmd.getCommandWord().equals("items")) {
214            this.items(vCmd);
215        } else {
216            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean...");
217        }
218    }
219
220    /**
221     * Afficher les informations de la salle actuelle et les objets dans joueur.
222     * @param pCmd commande a traiter 
223     */
224    private void look(final Command pCmd){
225        if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
226            String vItemName=pCmd.getSecondWord();
227            Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getOneItem(vItemName);
228            if(vItem==null){
229                this.aGui.println("The item you are looking for is not in this room.");
230                return;
231            }
232            this.aGui.println("There is "+vItem.getItemDescription()+".");
233            return;
234        }
235        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription(this.aPlayer)+"\n");
236    }
237
238    /**
239     * Manger un objet.
240     * @param pCmd commande a traiter
241     */
242    private void eat(final Command pCmd){
243        if (!pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
244            this.aGui.println("Eat what?");
245            return;
246        }
247        if(pCmd.getSecondWord().equals("magicCake")){
248            if(this.aPlayer.hasItem("magicCake")){
249                this.aPlayer.removeItem("magicCake");
250                this.aPlayer.setWeightAllowed(120);
251                this.aGui.println("You have eaten the magic cake and now you have "+this.aPlayer.getWeightAllowed()+"% capacity to carry things.");
252            }else{
253                this.aGui.println("You don't have the magic cake.");
254                return;
255            }
256        }
257        else
258            this.aGui.println("You have eaten a food imaginary, you are not hungry anymore.");
259    }
260
261    /**
262     * Tester les commandes dans un fichier.
263     * @param pCmd commande a traiter qui a le nom du fichier comme second mot
264     */
265    private void test(final Command pCmd){
266        if (!pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
267            this.aGui.println("Test what?");
268            return;
269        }
270        Scanner vSc=null;
271        try { // pour "essayer" les instructions suivantes :
272            vSc = new Scanner( new File( pCmd.getSecondWord()+".txt" ) ); // ouverture du fichier s'il existe
273            while ( vSc.hasNextLine() ) { // tant qu'il y a encore une ligne a lire dans le fichier
274                interpretCommand(vSc.nextLine()); // lecture de la ligne dans le fichier
275                /// traitement de la ligne lue
276            } // while
277        } // try
278        catch ( final FileNotFoundException pFNFE ) { // si le fichier n'existe pas
279            /// traitement en cas d'exception
280        } // catch
281        finally
282        {
283            if(vSc !=null)
284            {
285                vSc.close();
286                return;
287            }
288        }
289    }
290
291    /**
292     * Prendre un objet.
293     * @param pCmd commande a traiter
294     */
295    private void take(final Command pCmd){
296        if (!pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
297            this.aGui.println("Take what?");
298            return;
299        }
300        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
301        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getOneItem(vItemName);
302        if(vItem==null){
303            this.aGui.println("There is no such item in this room.");
304            return;
305        }
306        if(vItem.getCanBePickedUp()&&this.aPlayer.pickUpItem(vItem, aGui)){
307                this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().removeItem(vItemName);
308        }else if(!vItem.getCanBePickedUp()){
309            this.aGui.println(vItemName + " cannot be picked up.");
310        }
311    }
312
313    /**
314     * Lacher un objet.
315     * @param pCmd commande a traiter
316     */
317    private void drop(final Command pCmd){
318        if (!pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
319            this.aGui.println("Drop what?");
320            return;
321        }
322        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
323        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getOneItem(vItemName);
324        if(vItem==null){
325            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item in your inventory.");
326            return;
327        }
328        this.aPlayer.dropItem(vItemName, aGui);
329        this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().addItem(vItem);
330    }
331
332    /**
333     * Afficher les objets dans joueur.
334     * @param pCmd commande a traiter 
335     */
336    private void items(final Command pCmd){
337        if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
338            this.aGui.println("Items can't be followed by a second word.");
339            return; 
340        }
341        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getItemsNames()+"\n"+this.aPlayer.getWeightInfo());
342    }
343}
